text: Cloppenburg () is a town in Lower Saxony, Germany, capital of Cloppenburg District and part of Oldenburg MÃ¼nsterland. It is 38 km south-south-west of Oldenburg in the Weser-Ems region between Bremen and the Dutch border. ==Twin town== Cloppenburg is twinned with: * Bernay, France ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Towns in Lower Saxony Category:Cloppenburg (district)
